ygData.messageBody:
Ok lets put some logic to this, what happens when you are in a Dungeon and
you do an area spell to a mob near a door? Well whatever is behind the door
opens the door and attacks you of course. As a programmer I can say that
the technique used for this is the same they would use for buildings, but
choose not to. From my conversation with a GM they told me the programmers
left it that way as a joke, sort of their backdoor if you will. Things like
can be taken advantage of if you think about so they have not fully
implemented it yet.

Just my 2 coppers worth.

Shadair
16th Wizard of the House of J'Axx
Karana
